what is imei: IMEI (International Mobile Equipment Identity) is a unique 15-digit number assigned to every mobile device. It's used to identify and track mobile phones.
how to check imei: To check your IMEI, dial *#06# on your phone's keypad. The IMEI number will be displayed on your screen.
phone unlocking process: Our phone unlocking process involves submitting your device's IMEI number, selecting your current carrier, and choosing an unlocking service. Once payment is made, we'll process your unlock request and provide instructions within 24-48 hours.
supported carriers: We support unlocking for major carriers worldwide, including AT&T, T-Mobile, Verizon, Sprint, and many international carriers. Please check our website for a full list of supported carriers.
refund policy: We offer a 100% money-back guarantee if we are unable to unlock your device. Refund requests must be made within 30 days of purchase.
blacklisted phones: A blacklisted phone is one that has been reported lost or stolen. We cannot unlock blacklisted devices. You can check if your phone is blacklisted using our IMEI check tool.
